text.more: Prepared by Tomasz Neugebauer and Felicity Tayler for Desire Lines: Mapping the Metadata of Toronto Arts Publishing (2021)
text.intro:
Nodes (dots) represent people. Edges (lines) connect people through magazine issues that they collaborated on.
Edge color represents magazine(s). Edge width, how many issues. Node size is mapped to betweenness centrality.
text.title: Fireweeed, Fuse (Centerfold), Border/Lines Magazine Contributors 1976-1987

legend.colorLabel:
The colour of the dot represents an algoyrythmically proposed "community"
The colour of the line represents a magazine title, or multiple magazine titles
